/opt/homebrew/bin/g++  -Wall -Wextra -pedantic -lncurses -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX14.4.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/checkers_game.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/checkers_game.dir/checkers_board/checkers_board.cpp.o -o checkers_game
